statements: SELECT * FROM login_credentials;
SELECT id, username FROM login_credentials ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username FROM login_credentials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, password FROM login_credentials WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM login_credentials WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, username FROM login_credentials WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'John%' AND password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM login_credentials;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE login_time > '2022-01-01' AND logout_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY login_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(login_time) AS last_login FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username FROM users INNER JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id WHERE access_logs.logout_time IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username,password FROM login_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id,login_time,logout_time FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE permission_level > 5;
SELECT role, COUNT(*) FROM access_control GROUP BY role ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM login_credentials WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM login_credentials JOIN access_control ON login_credentials.user_id = access_control.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, a.login_time FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN access_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id ORDER BY a.login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
